website_summaries.verdict: A basic ultracompact point-and-shoot with a touch screen, the Panasonic Lumix DMC-FP3 can outshoot the average camera phone.
cons: mediocre features and photos for price

customer_reviews.title: Amazon did it again/1
customer_reviews.text: I don't know diddley squat about cameras - bought this one because of all it's great reviews. My daughter called me on a Friday @ 5pm and said the grandson (who has Aspergers) dropped his camera (which he plays with everyday) and was hysterical. I looked up cameras on Amazon, found this one and ordered it. He received it ON SATURDAY MORNING! HOLY CATS! Hysteria resolved. He e-mails me photos every week (I live in Maine - he is in NJ). And he has even posted three movies on YouTube that he made with this camera - and for his age, they aren't bad. I love you Amazon and Panasonic. Good Job!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big Hit
customer_reviews.text: I have a Nikon SLR. I love the camera, but it is bulky. My wife loves the Nikon, but she was looking for something compact. I bought this camera because of other reviews, and quite honestly, the price. The camera takes excellent pictures and is extremely easy to use. Downloading to the computer is also very simple. It is a perfect size and has a great screen. I would recommend this camera to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: J. ROGERS

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: I studied a lot of reviews before purchasing this camera about 8 months ago. I have a large SLR camera for fancier photography, but I wanted something small with video functions to carry in my pocket. This camera is great for my use, which is mostly daylight and outside shots. It takes good clear photos & videos, is easy to use and easy to carry with you. I paid $104 for it and am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: just mewritingareview

customer_reviews.title: Great product for an awesome price!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good camera for a really good price. I was quite pleased with the quality of the photos and the overall look. The touchscreen feature sometimes doesn't quite work as expected, but with patience it gets the job done. The 14.1 MP resolution results in great pictures, but the functions are still a little complicated for me... There are many different combinations that can be used which becomes a little too much. I highly recomend this camera. However, if you have issues with a touchscreen, this camera might not be the one for you, as the touchscreen on it sometimes doesn't respond. I am really pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Victoria Healey

customer_reviews.title: Lumix Camera
customer_reviews.text: I adore this little point and shoot. It takes great photos and the touch screen IF you follow the instructions and stay in the zone where touches work does fine. It's nice a compact, great for a backup camera if you don't want to lug around a DSLR that day.
customer_reviews.author: gk

customer_reviews.title: Quite wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This camera is great. I bought it for a newby digital camera user, and he loves it. It has all the features he wanted! Thank you for making such a wonderful product available for such a magnificent price. PS I liked it so much, I got another one.
customer_reviews.author: Bay Girl

customer_reviews.title: Best Camera Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite camera! I reach for it over any other camera. It is both small and powerful. It is a point and shoot, but it does a great job of giving you quality pictures.
customer_reviews.author: AdventureGurl

customer_reviews.title: I Love It!!!
customer_reviews.text: It is the best camera i have ever had!its amazing!and a great price...picture quaility is so good..the only CON is with the video when you upload it it is HD so it takes a long time to upload 2 min. videos...but other than that..Its great.
customer_reviews.author: Dakotah P.

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic Lumix DMC-FP3 broke within first 2 months of purchase
customer_reviews.text: I did research this brand and model before final purchase. I used it for about 2 months and camera started to act out and finally stopped working all together. If I did not have warranty, I would have lost $190! However, Panasonic shipped me two different models which did not meet my expectations. I returned the first one, but decided to keep second one (I did not want to continue arguing with Panasonic on their product low quality. However, to be fair, the last camera is still working and takes great photos.
customer_reviews.author: FoxyEddie

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: very good item is OK I like very good very good very good very good very good very good very good
customer_reviews.author: Carlos E. Azuaje Arias

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2 and sadly gave one away and the other ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 and sadly gave one away and the other got broken. It is still usable but we cant find a comparable replacement
customer_reviews.author: Skip69nc

customer_reviews.title: Kind of tough on batteries
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife to keep in her purse. I have had to replace the battery three times in almost two years. It is just a fair camera for the inexperienced.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Willey

customer_reviews.title: Not so good
customer_reviews.text: Cons: Image quality is not so good and the indoor IQ is a disaster... Low light and High ISO produces terrible noises. Even ISO 400 looks blur. In addition, the white balance is not accurate and don't trust what you see on the LCD screen. Pros: Nice design and perfect size. Lovely HD video recording function. Easy to use. Touch screen is acceptably responsive. This one doesn't match the reputation of Lumix.
customer_reviews.author: lumix

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: Just got this Friday. 3 days ago. So far I am impressed. I took some pics going down the road while my friend drove. Very clear. Easy to use, good quality pics and seems like battery life is good so far. The fast burst option is great. Very fast. Also the response time of each pic. is very fast. Videos are clear with pretty good sound. Would definately recommend the class 6 or better memory card as was recommended to me theough reviews. Solid little camera and good price. Hope it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: J.W.H.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for-
customer_reviews.text: I have a nice SLR type camera and like it alot but it is large and bulky. i wanted a small easy to use camera that takes great pictures. With so many to choose from I did alot of searching and comparing. Well, I made a good decision with this camera, It's just what I wanted and does everything I want it to in a small, lightweight camera. I would recomend it to anyone that wants a small, easy to use camera that takes great photos.
customer_reviews.author: daveoso

customer_reviews.title: Great slim Camera
customer_reviews.text: I like this camera because its thin, durable, easy to use and does a great Macro shot, my other cameras could not even come close and they cost much more. For me its a great little camera for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great camera. My only disappointment with it came when ...
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. My only disappointment with it came when i dropped it. The company told me that I could not repair it, I better buy a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Anyway lee

customer_reviews.title: Nice Camera, Good customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this camera as a birthday gift and when we received it, the rear screen was cracked. I notified PlatinumBuys and they immediately sent me free postage and easy instructions to send it back. I had a new camera within 2 weeks and it has been well received. Easy to use, clear, quick shutter speed and multiple setting options. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: N-

customer_reviews.title: Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a camera that I had owned in the past. In its compact size it is easy to use and takes wonderful pictures. It is a camera that I would recommend anyone to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic Lumix
customer_reviews.text: Very good, small good quality pictures 14 MP easy to operate, nice looking. Arrived in time.Nice color just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Luis F. Ocampo

customer_reviews.title: awesome camera
customer_reviews.text: I have never had a camera so easy to use with a picture that looks incredible. This camera is exactly as the ads on TV describe. . simple and I love the clarity in the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: P. M. Mc Gonigle

customer_reviews.title: Product met expectations
customer_reviews.text: The model was to replace a stolen camera, I was pleased with its price and condition. Overall a good purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Willaim J Comerford

customer_reviews.title: best camera thats not professional
customer_reviews.text: I Love this Camera. Well Actually my wife loves it. I feel it is about the best digital camera you can buy thats not professional grade.
customer_reviews.author: sjames37

customer_reviews.title: Very good camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is very good to start with. It's affordable price, nice sleek design, touch screen and other simple options you can use. The problem is you cannot set the date attach to the photo picture as I had in my old Nikon camera. Overall, this camera is quite good. The video is great. Simple camera but tells alot.
customer_reviews.author: Lili_08

customer_reviews.title: lo maximo
customer_reviews.text: this camera is the best and highly recommend amazon comptrado the staff totally serious when products despachardthis camera is the best and highly recommend amazon comptrado the staff totally serious when products despachard
customer_reviews.author: lo maximo

customer_reviews.title: do i? :)
customer_reviews.text: i ordered this camera because it has good specifications for that "much" money,but,do i get a charger for battery?or i would have to buy it separetly?
customer_reviews.author: do i?

customer_reviews.title: My favorite camera EVER!
customer_reviews.text: My nephew bought this camera for my daughter when she was going to Germany, on a school trip, several years ago. She loved it so much, I bought myself one. I have used for everything from high school plays to soccer to very up close nature photos. I have never had a camera that was as versatile. I highly recommend this camera for a beginner to an advanced user. You will not be disappointed. Oh and the battery life is outstanding!
customer_reviews.author: Donna M

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: This product is at best average. It takes good pictures, especially outdoors, but a few features it doesn't have makes it a little annoying. First of all, you can't zoom in or out when video recording!! This is pretty silly as even phones will do that. Also, the touch screen is rather poor.Slow and unresponsive. This makes it especially difficult when reviewing pictures on the device. If you press the back/forward button continuously, i'd expect it to pick up speed after a second or two,but alas it moves at the same speed. Imagine trying to go through 100 pictures!!
customer_reviews.author: Oyeols

customer_reviews.title: A super camera with super results.
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this camera. It fits in the pocket and takes fabulous photos and videos. I've had many people ask me about the camera as they've seen the results. For the price, it's a great buy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bazza

customer_reviews.title: small but mighty
customer_reviews.text: This camera realy surprised me. It is great to take along because it fits in my shirt pocket.It does what I want and then some.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pictures are not as sharp or vivid? (even in Vivid mode)
customer_reviews.text: I bought my Panasonic Lumix DMC-FP3 last June 2010. I have had 2 Sony cybershots in the past, though pictures were nice and sharp, the lifespan of these previous cameras were only 2 years max. For the Lumix, my photos are not very sharp -- a bit hazy -- despite cleaning the lens, and putting it in Vivid mode. Pls help... I know Panasonic Lumix has a good reputation as a good camera, but I'm not seeing this in my Lumix now.... pls help.
customer_reviews.author: Mia Alentajan

customer_reviews.title: Lumix is user friendly, intuitive
customer_reviews.text: Even without bothering to read the product manual, I was able to figure out how to get started using the Panasonic Lumix. Small-size makes it ideal for casual travel photography.
customer_reviews.author: E. Fields

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Has a quick start up takes great pictures as seen with some of my uploads and takes great video. Couldnt really ask any more from the price.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac Montoya

product_meta.title: Panasonic Lumix DMC-FP3 14.1 MP Digital Camera with 4x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom and 3.0-Inch Touch-Screen LCD (Black)
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackFROM THE MANUFACTURER


The flat body and compact size of the DMC-FP3 allow it to fit nicely into a small handbag. Built of high-quality aluminum, the DMC-FP3 also brings a wide range of colors to the series. The new lens cover both protects the lens from scratches or dusts and serves as the camera's power switch, making it fast and easy to slip the camera out of a pocket or a bag and turn on the power. The delicate hairline finish on the lens cover of the DMC-FP3 elegantly accents the design. You'll want to take this sleek, stylish camera with you everywhere you go, like a fashion accessory. 

Lumix DMX-FP3 Highlights 

Touch Screen Operation
The newly adopted static sensor type 3.0-inch touch-screen LCD on the DMC-FP3 gives you an easy, intuitive control thanks to a hybrid operation combined with the 4 major operation buttons. Touch operation is free and smooth either in recording or playing back images. 

Once you compose the flame, all you have to do is touch the area you wish to focus on before pressing the shutter button halfway. 

You can drag the image across the screen with a finger to browse the collection of photos as you flip over the pages of the book. Sonic Speed AF
The Sonic Speed AF system in the DMC-FP3 has a maximum speed of approx. 0.33 second for auto focusing*. It includes numerous re-engineering enhancements, including a higher-speed actuator, optimized algorithms and parallel software processing. The result is fast and accurate AF performance. You can quickly get moving subjects in focus, such as when you're shooting sports scenes.
* Using the 1-area AF, at the wide-end. 

HD Movie Recording
The DMC-FP3 can record motion images in high-definition (1,280 x 720 pixels at 30 fps in Motion JPEG format). The pixel mixed readout method enables bright motion-image recording even in low-light settings. The DMC-FP3 can also record full-size motion images in WVGA (848 x 480 pixels at 30 fps) or standard motion images in VGA (640 x 480 pixels at 30 fps) and QVGA (320 x 240 pixels at 30 fps). 


4x Optical Zoom / Up to 8.4x Extra Optical Zoom
The DMC-FP3 is equipped with a 4x optical zoom lens (35mm camera equivalent: 35-140mm). The Extra Optical Zoom function*1 uses the center part of the CCD to extend this 4x zoom ratio to powerful 8.4x zoom (35mm camera equivalent: 295mm) at a resolution of 3-megapixel or less. Adding the Extra Optical Zoom to the 4x digital zoom*2 extends the total zooming power to a maximum of 33.8x.
*1 At a resolution of 3-megapixel or less. In the DMC-FP3, image resolution is kept at its maximum size to the optical tele-end even if the Extra Optical Zoom is ON.
*2 As digital magnification increases, resolution significantly decreases. Venus Engine IV
The image-processing engine, Venus Engine IV, uses advanced signal processing to give you beautiful images even when the sensitivity is high. Multi-task signal processing is employed for all images to enable high-speed, high-performance shooting. Venus Engine IV also effectively raises the precision of various functions, such as MEGA O.I.S. (Optical Image Stabilizer) and Intelligent ISO Control. Along with its extremely high performance, Venus Engine IV reduces power consumption thanks to a number of energy efficiency improvements. Extended Battery Life
The energy-saving Venus Engine IV image-processing engine and the efficient, rechargeable lithium-ion battery which has been slimmed down to fit into thinner camera bodies work together to extend the shooting time of the DMC-FP3. This lets users take approx. 300 shots on a single battery charge*.
* Based on the CIPA standard.
feature_bullets: The flat body & compact size of the DMC-FP3 allow it to fit nicely into a small handbag
The new lens cover both protects the lens form scratches or dusts & serves as the cam's power swth
The static sensor type 3.0-inch touch-screen LCD gives you an intuitive control thanks to a hybrid operation combined with the 4 operation buttons
Touch operation is free and smooth either in recording or playing back images
The DMC-FP3 is equipped with a 4x optical zoom lens 35mm cam eqvi: 35-140mm
